text: Hanki maka tamagri naga'ma umani'naza moparegati vahe'mo'za maka tamagri nagara zamagra hosi afu zamifine, tonki afu zamifine, kemoli afu zamifine, karisi zamifine zamavarentete'za zamavare'za nagri ruotge agona Jerusalemia egahaze huno Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne. Israeli vahe'mo'zama witi ofama hunaku'ma, nagri navure'ma agruma hu'nea zuompafima witima erinte'za nagri mono nompima vazaza hu'za zamagrira zamavare'za egahaze.
